add_browser_box.description_dismoi: DisMoi lets internet users, media and experts share helpful information directly on the webpages you visit.

step3.title: Welcome to DisMoi
step3.paragraph: <0>- We have preselected several Guides for you to follow. Now you can decide who to follow!</0><1>- Once you're done, you can go back to browsing the web normally. Posts from Guides you follow will appear directly on the web pages you visit.</1>
